channel.title: Subsribe on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Subsribe on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Stuff I'd like to see Google Reader do
item.description: I wish I could filter my feeds like I do my email, marking the news items in my web comic feeds as read automatically and blocking (deleting? marking as read?) feeds originating at certain URLs (some of my friends have different… taste than I do… repeatedly). I also wish I could share my feeds with different audiences in mind. Right now what I share is pretty bland because my clients, friends, and family all see it.
